SEARCH
Package model

Class KnowledgeCapsuleSystem

java.lang.Object
model.KnowledgeCapsuleSystem
public class KnowledgeCapsuleSystem extends Object
The KnowledgeCapsuleSystem class represents a system that manages a set of projects, each with their own set of stages and knowledge capsules. It provides methods for creating projects, adding stages to projects, adding knowledge capsules to stages, and more.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final int
    PROJECTS
    This variable is the number of projects

  • Constructor Details

    • KnowledgeCapsuleSystem

      public KnowledgeCapsuleSystem()

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public String createProject(String projectName, String clientName, String clientPhone, double budget, String managerName, String managerPhone, int projectDuration, int[] stageMonths)
      Creates a new Project object and adds it to the projects array.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project.
      clientName - the name of the client.
      clientPhone - the phone number of the client.
      budget - the budget of the project.
      managerName - the name of the project manager.
      managerPhone - the phone number of the project manager.
      projectDuration - the duration of the project in months.
      stageMonths - an array that stores the duration of each stage of the project in months.
      Returns:
      a message indicating whether the project was successfully created.

    • culminateStage

      public String culminateStage(String projectName)
      Sets the current stage of a project to the next stage.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      Returns:
      a message indicating if the stage was culminated successfully

    • passCapsule

      public String passCapsule(String capsuleID, String searchedProject)
      Updates the status of the capsule to "Approved" and sets the date of approval.
      Parameters:
      capsuleID - the ID of the capsule to pass
      searchedProject - the name of the project to which the capsule belongs
      Returns:
      a message indicating the status of the capsule after being passed and the date of approval if it was approved, or a message indicating that the capsule does not exist

    • releaseCapsule

      public String releaseCapsule(String capsuleID, String searchedProject)
      Releases a capsule by setting its URL, assuming it has been approved and not published before.
      Parameters:
      capsuleID - the ID of the capsule to be released
      searchedProject - the name of the project where the capsule belongs
      Returns:
      a message indicating if the capsule was successfully released, or if it does not exist, was not approved, or has been published before

    • findProjectByName

      public Project findProjectByName(String name)
      Searches for a project in the array of projects by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the project to be searched for
      Returns:
      the project with the given name, or null if it is not found

    • getFirstAvailableProjectIndex

      public int getFirstAvailableProjectIndex()
      getFirstAvailableProjectIndex: search in array if exist one valid position
      Returns:
      pos -1 if the position does not exist, a number in [0, 9] if exist a valid position

    • projectMaxCapsules

      public String projectMaxCapsules()
      This function returns the name(s) of the project(s) with the highest number of capsules by iterating through all projects, stages, and capsules.
      Returns:
      a string containing the names of the project(s) with the maximum number of capsules.

    • listLearnings

      public String listLearnings(String projectName, int stageName)
      The function returns a string containing a list of learnings for a specific stage in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - a String representing the name of a project
      stageName - An integer representing the stage of the project.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String message that lists the learnings for a specific stage of a project. The message includes the stage name, capsule ID, and learning description for each capsule in the specified stage.

    • searchColaboratorCapsules

      public String searchColaboratorCapsules(String nombreColaborador)
      Searches for capsules that have a collaborator with a given name.
      Parameters:
      nombreColaborador - The name of the collaborator to search for.
      Returns:
      A String containing the IDs of the capsules that have the collaborator

    • searchLearns

      public String searchLearns(String Keyword)
      The function searches for capsules published or approved in projects and stages that contain a specific keyword
      Parameters:
      Keyword - The keyword that is being searched for in the capsules' hashtags.
      Returns:
      a String message that contains the ID and learning information

    • getProject

      public Project[] getProject()
      Returns the array of projects.
      Returns:
      an array of projects
